nithiwirodhiwa puththalama nagaraye niwasaka pawathwagena giya pradeshiya guwan widuli madhyasthanayak pereda (10 da) watalu puththalama polisiya ehi thibu wikashana katayuthu kirimata yoda gath upakarana thogayak athadanguwata gena atha.widuli sandeshana niyamaka komisama wetha pradeshawasin wisin kara thibu danum dimak anuwa ema niladharin wisin puththalama polisiye niladharin pirisakage sahayogaya athiwa mema watalima sidukarana ladi.mema guwan widuli sewaya mathaka sita kriyathmaka kara athi athara eya puththalama pradeshaye kilomitar 15 – 20 th athara aawaranaya karamin pasugiya dinawala pracharaka katayuthu pawathwagena gos thibuni.

athithayeda owunage aagama budu dahama wuwada bauddha aagamika ahili kirima thahanamwiya.mowun rathkawalli ha swarnamali thamin hadunwanu labu dewanganak pidima sidu kalaha.kalu kumara ha dala kumara nam yakshayan dedanaku adahima karanaladi.mowun itha daksha manthrakaruwan wiya kese wethath owun athara sudu abhicharayanta wada kalu abhicharayan bahula wiya.podujanaya thula mowun pilibada dadi sakamusu biyak pawathina.rodiyaku niwasata paminiwita ohu kopa noganwa kisiwak di misa pitath kirimata janaya biyawuha.

wideshiya rataka nishpaditha jiwa athbomba dekak niwese thabagena siti yuda hamuda sarayanwarayaku athadanguwata gena adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen pasuwa homagama athireka disa winisuru ha mahesthrath sumith perera mahatha wisin rakshitha bandhanagara gathakara thabimata niyoga kara atha.mese rakshitha bandhanagara gathakaranu labuwe migoda gaminipura pradeshaye padinchi panagoda yuda hamuda kandawure sewaya kala sarayanwarayeki.nugegoda kottasaya bhara jyeshta polis adhikari saliya da silwa mahathage upades matha homagama mulasthana polis parikshaka prasanna rathnayaka mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe aparadha anshaye sthanadhipathi po. pa. ti. em. chandrasekara, u. po. pa. asim athulu niladhari kandayamak watalima sidukara sakakaru adhikaranaya hamuwata idiripath kara thibuni..
piliwelakata liyanna oonane randika.
amathaka karala aadare karapu pawata
pi්rati tharayema kiya sitiya.
thama athe thuwala honda wela na.
oya kochchara kiwuwath oyage kathru thuma lankawe adhikaranayata bara wela naduwa iwara wenakam eya nithiyen panayana nithiya kadana kenek...

yapanaya,karuwempilleyi pradeshaye niwasakata kisiyam pirisak wisin petral bomba praharayak ella kara thibenawa.ada (19) dahawal mema praharaya ellawi athi bawayi polisiya pawasuwe.muhunu aawaranaya karagena yathurupadiwalin pamini kandayamak adala niwasa wetha petral bomba praharaya ella kota athi bawata mulika parikshana waladi aanawaranaya wi thibenawa.praharayen niwase nawatha thibu wan rathayak sampurnayen ginigena athi athara,niwasa idiripasa nawatha thibu yathurupadi dekakata ha niwasata sulu hani wi athi bawayi polisiya kiya sitiye.siddhiya sambandhayen yapanaya polisiya wadidura parikshana sidu karanawa.
